problem: Estimate the air pressure inside a category 5 hurricane, where the wind speed is 300 km/h. (set the pressure outside the hurricane is atmospheric pressure and the speed of the wind outside the hurricane is 0)

correctFormulas.name: Bernoulli (dynamic pressure drop)
correctFormulas.formula: P₍out₎ + ½ρ v₍out₎² = P₍in₎ + ½ρ v₍in₎²

steps.explanation: Assume heights are equal so the Bernoulli equation reduces to equating static plus dynamic pressures along a streamline.
steps.notations: P₍out₎ − P₍in₎ = ½ρ₍air₎ (v₍in₎² − v₍out₎²) = ½ρ₍air₎ v₍in₎²

steps.explanation: Compute the pressure drop associated with 83.3 m/s winds.
Subtract the drop from atmospheric pressure to estimate the interior pressure.
